name: Bandwidth Marketing Group
tagline: BIG BRAINS in a bite sized boutique
description:
We call ourselves a Creative Consultancy. Why? Because we don’t come in touting ads or digital or social or whatever. In each initial meeting, we simply listen.
We ask about your business objectives, buyers, budgets, and brand. In this way, our strategic and creative solutions are right for your needs, not ours. The tactics are customized, and may even be different from what you first considered.
That breadth of ability, and the right insight behind it, is made possible via Bandwidth’s big brain talent and big brand backgrounds, all housed in a nimble boutique. Your very own SWAT team.
With B to B, B to C, and the ABC’s of client work from AT&T to BP to COKE, this executive crew has experience that’s both broad and deep. So now we’ll quickly talk about who we are. But know that we’d rather talk about what you do. And how our team can help make the doing easier.
